DialogueOption.Text: I found a black hole that took me to a new solar system!

Dialogue.Page: It's nice to meet you, too! Your village is quite cute, I must say.
Yes, I am! I'm just passing through.
Actually, I could use your help with something.
Unfortunately, I'm not here on vacation.
I'm looking for my magic banjo.
That's right! A group of Nomai stole it from me and fled to this solar system.
I only just started searching, but I've determined that it is not on <color=orange>Timber Hearth</color>.
I tried using the radio at the house behind me to locate it, but I can't get it to work. It doesn't seem to be making any <color=orange>sound</color>.
It's a bit more analog than I'm used to.
Anyway, I'm going to rest here for a moment before continuing. If you wouldn't mind, keep an eye out for my magic banjo.
So it's true, then. They used the banjo to create another solar system. That means everything in that system comes from <color=orange>the mind of the one that played the banjo</color>.
That's right! Nothing within that solar system is original! All of it is a mixture of the Nomai's thoughts and experiences. What a terrifying thought.
Anyway, thank you for your help today. Even though I could not retrieve the banjo, it is far out of anyone or anything's reach.
I'll return back to my clan soon.
By the way, I noticed another banjo on this planet with strange properties. I dismissed it earlier, but I took a closer look while you were gone.
I detected it near <color=orange>the mountain range to the west</color>. Might be worth a look!
